mapper.update:
update
set FName = #{FName}, FNum = #{FNum}, CustomerRating = #{CustomerRating}, TType = #{TType}, FContacts = #{FContacts}, ContactPhone = #{ContactPhone}, FAddress = #{FAddress}, Industry = #{Industry}, TaxRegistrationNum = #{TaxRegistrationNum}, BankAccount = #{BankAccount}, FCity = #{FCity}, LegalRepresentative = #{LegalRepresentative}, FStatus = #{FStatus}, CustomerCreditRating = #{CustomerCreditRating}, Describe = #{Describe}, FCreatePersonID = #{FCreatePersonID}, FCreateTime = #{FCreateTime}, LastModifiedBy = #{LastModifiedBy}, LastModificationTime = #{LastModificationTime} where Customer_ID = #{Customer_ID}
mapper.select: select s.name FCreatePerson,s1.name LastModifiedPerson, from f LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s ON f.FCreatePersonID=s.staff_id LEFT JOIN OA_STAFF s1 ON f.LastModifiedBy=s1.staff_id where f.Customer_ID = #{Customer_ID}

and ( f.FName LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FAddress LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.FContacts LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
